items.content_html: At Anima, we are always looking for new ways to automate our workflows. One of these efforts involved creating a new CircleCI pipeline to automatically deploy some NPM packages, removing the need for tedious manual work. The plan was straightforward: once started, the pipeline would bump the version of our packages (using Lerna), build them and finally publish them on our NPM registry.
